name: 500th Anniversary of the Swedish Riksdag
obverse: Four men representing the four social estates originally represented in the Riksdag: the nobility, the clergy, the burghers, and the yeomanry. Over them is a coat of arms with three crowns.
reverse: A scroll with two lions standing on top of the scroll flanking a coat of arms with a crown on top.
reverse_inscriptions: SVERIGES RIKSDAG ÅT·MINNET·AV·FEM HUNDRAFEMTIO·ÅR ÄGNADE·VÅRDEN AV·RIKE·OCH·FOLK 1935
description: This medal was copied almost exactly from the medal created in 1935.
